name: Infusionsoft SDK
author: Novak Solutions

sections.description:
Easily integrate with the Infusionsoft API using the free Novak Solutions SDK. This plugin is a dependency for other Infusionsoft plugins.

Easily enter your Infusionsoft app name and API key. The full SDK will be available to any plugins that need it, or your own custom code.

Several plugins require this plugin in order to function, such as:

  • Infusionsoft Exit Optin
  • Infusionsoft One-click Upsell

Check out Novak Solutions for more free Infusionsoft tools!
sections.changelog:
1.0.13

  • Updated to latest Novak Solutions SDK

1.0.12

  • Removed utilities folder to improve security

1.0.11

  • Removed test and examples folders to improve security
  • Updated to latest Novak Solutions SDK

1.0.10

  • Fixes issue with action sequences
  • Updated to latest Novak Solutions SDK

1.0.9

  • MANDATORY UPDATE! This release includes the latest Infusionsoft PEM file.
  • Updated to latest Novak Solutions SDK

1.0.8

  • Tested up to 3.8.2
  • Add link to settings page in the notice that appears if the SDK isn’t configured
  • Updated to latest Novak Solutions SDK

1.0.7

  • Compatibility fix for PHP v5.2.x

1.0.6

  • Version bump to fix SVN snafu

1.0.5

  • Check if Infusionsoft credentials are set before loading SDK.
  • Added link to rate plugin.
  • Added link to more plugins by Novak Solutions.
  • Better comments in plugin code.

1.0.4

  • Updated to latest Novak Solutions SDK
  • Improved app name and API key sanitation

1.0.3

  • Updated to latest Novak Solutions SDK

1.0.2

  • Removed function call that didn’t exist.

1.0.1

  • Version increment to try to fix bug on WordPress.org

1.0.0

  • First release on WordPress.org
